title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: The bug is related to accessibility problems. Currently, the user needs to first click on one of the 'live' areas such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame before it starts working. When the Help view is launched on Windows 2000, the tab key does not perform any action.
OB: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: The tab key should be able to navigate through the elements in the Help view.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Help view on Windows 2000. 2. Press the tab key and observe that nothing happens.
